SubtleCryptoVerify.summary:
The verify() method of the
interface verifies a digital signature.

remarks.para:
It takes as its arguments a key to verify the signature with, some
algorithm-specific parameters, the signature, and the original signed data. It returns a
which will be fulfilled with a boolean value
indicating whether the signature is valid.

-.
-RFC 3447 specifies RSASSA-PKCS1-v1_5.
-RFC 3447 specifies RSA-PSS.
-FIPS-186 specifies ECDSA.
-FIPS 198-1 specifies HMAC.

SubtleCryptoVerify.returns:
A that fulfills with a
boolean value: true if the signature is valid, false
otherwise.
